root.name: Where The Wild Things Are
root.description: OverviewWhere The Wild Things Are is an action/adventure game developed by both WayForward (Nintendo DS version) and Griptonite Games (All other versions) and published by WB Games for the Xbox 360, Wii, PlayStation 3, and Nintendo DS platforms.History of PropertyWhere the Wild Things Are is a children's picture book written by author Maurice Sendak, originally released in 1963. While the book only contains ten sentences worth of dialogue, it is considered a classic of children's literature.The book was awarded the Caldecott Medal in 1964, won the Boston Globe-Horn Book Award, and was an ALAM notable book.Xbox 360 InstallationThe amount of memory it takes to install this game is 6.8 GB.
